pending_cases.details_and_present_status_of_appeal: Crl.M.C No 10206 of 2023 was filed Before the Honble High Court of Kerala, which is still Pending, wherein in the Honble Kerala High Court was pleased to pass an interim order dated 29-11-2023 directing the police not to initiate any coercive proceedings against the candidate.
